label: 青蓮院
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: With Kajii-in and Myōhō-in, one of the three great monzeki of the Enryakuji complex on Mt. Hiei, now located at Awataguchi, Higashiyama-ku, Kyoto. [梶井院　妙法院　門跡　延暦寺　比叡山　粟田口　東山区]
